original: @163b * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @163b * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble AvalokiteÅ›vara, who has a pleasing form.

original: gzi brjid phung po mthong tsam gyis //
analyzed: gzi brjid phung po mthong tsam gyis //
translated: Merely by seeing the mass of his splendor,

original: skye bo kun gyi yid 'phrog cing //ðŸ”½rgyal po'i ngag bzhin thams cad la //
analyzed: skye bo kun gyi yid 'phrog cing // rgyal po'i ngag bzhin thams cad la //
translated: he captivates the minds of all beings.ðŸ”½He makes meaningful all the imprints

original: bsgos pa don yod byed rig bshad //
analyzed: bsgos pa don yod byed rig bshad //
translated: of the words of the king.

original: thog mar brtan g-yo nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: thog mar brtan g-yo nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: First, by the yoga of the earth and sky,

original: ngag bcad de las padma zla ba bskyed //
analyzed: ngag bcad de las padma zla ba bskyed //
translated: one should be silent and generate a lotus and moon from that.

original: de steng aa dang ka phreng ze'u 'bru can //
analyzed: de steng aa dang ka phreng ze'u 'bru can //
translated: Upon that, the garland of a and ka, with a pistil cup,

original: 'dres gyur mgon po yid 'ong gzugs can bsgom //
analyzed: 'dres gyur mgon po yid 'ong gzugs can bsgom //
translated: become mixed and one should meditate on the protector, who has a pleasing form.

original: shel ltar rab dangs rdo rje lta bur mkhregs pa'i sku //
analyzed: shel ltar rab dangs rdo rje lta bur mkhregs pa'i sku //
translated: His body is clear like crystal and firm like a vajra,ðŸ”½white with a reddish glow, very radiant and pure,

original: dkar la dmar dangs shin tu 'od gsal rnam par dag / bltas pas mi ngoms dpe byad mtshan rab kun rdzogs pa //
analyzed: dkar la dmar dangs shin tu 'od gsal rnam par dag / bltas pas mi ngoms dpe byad mtshan rab kun rdzogs pa //
translated: never satiating to behold, complete with all the signs and features,

original: skyabs sbyin chu skyes g-yas g-yon phyag rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: skyabs sbyin chu skyes g-yas g-yon phyag rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: his right and left hands in the mudras of granting refuge and the lotus.

original: brgya phrag 'od 'bar rgyan rnams las byung phan tshun 'od zer rnams 'khrugs pas //
analyzed: brgya phrag 'od 'bar rgyan rnams las byung phan tshun 'od zer rnams 'khrugs pas //
translated: The light rays from the ornaments of hundreds of blazing lights are mixed with each other.

original: nyid kyi sku bkab dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed dang rdo rje g-yung drung 'khyil //
analyzed: nyid kyi sku bkab dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed dang rdo rje g-yung drung 'khyil //
translated: The net and half-net that cover his body and the swastika vajra

original: zer phog pa dang gzugs brnyan rab 'dres tig tig gong bu 'khyil 'gyur te //
analyzed: zer phog pa dang gzugs brnyan rab 'dres tig tig gong bu 'khyil 'gyur te //
translated: are like a drop of water that is mixed with a reflection and is a mass of swirling circles.

original: spu sgo kun la rin chen 'od 'dzag mkha' la nyi ltar mdzes bdag gyur //
analyzed: spu sgo kun la rin chen 'od 'dzag mkha' la nyi ltar mdzes bdag gyur //
translated: The light of jewels falling from all the pores of his body is beautiful like the sun in the sky.

original: de'i snying por yi ge gsum pa 'dus pa la nu ma gnyis kyis brgyan pa bltas la /
analyzed: de'i snying por yi ge gsum pa 'dus pa la nu ma gnyis kyis brgyan pa bltas la /
translated: In his heart, the three syllables are gathered, adorned with two breasts.

original: dad pa dang lhan cig pa'i 'od kyi zhags pas po ta la nas gzhon nu 'bar ba nyid bkug la /
analyzed: dad pa dang lhan cig pa'i 'od kyi zhags pas po ta la nas gzhon nu 'bar ba nyid bkug la /
translated: With faith, the lasso of light summons the blazing youth from Potala.

original: bcu drug dang brgyad dang / nyi shu dang bcu dang / bdun dang lnga la sogs pa'i lha mo lte ba'i sgo las mngon par 'phro ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: bcu drug dang brgyad dang / nyi shu dang bcu dang / bdun dang lnga la sogs pa'i lha mo lte ba'i sgo las mngon par 'phro ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
translated: With the sixteen, eight, twenty, ten, seven, five, and so on, goddesses emanating from the door of the navel, he is perfectly offered all offerings.

original: phyogs kyi gzhon nu ma bzhis yid 'ong mtshungs med la sogs pas bstod nas lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu'i rang bzhin gyis bkug cing bcug ste bcings la dgyes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gzhon nu ma bzhis yid 'ong mtshungs med la sogs pas bstod nas lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu'i rang bzhin gyis bkug cing bcug ste bcings la dgyes par bya'o //
translated: The four young goddesses in the directions praise Manohara and so forth, and then summon, induct, bind, and delight her with hooks, lassos, chains, and bells.

original: de nas @164a * //
analyzed: de nas @164a * //
translated: Then,

original: thugs ka dang ljags la yi ge bzhi dang bcu drug gi padmo dang 'khor lo nye bar bkod de /
analyzed: thugs ka dang ljags la yi ge bzhi dang bcu drug gi padmo dang 'khor lo nye bar bkod de /
translated: the four and sixteen syllables are arranged on the lotus and wheel at the heart and tongue.

original: byams pa chen po'i yid kyis bzlas la /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i yid kyis bzlas la /
translated: Recite with a mind of great love.

original: nam gyi tshe skye bo bdag gi ming thos pa dang / gzugs mthong bas dbang po mngon par g-yo ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam gyi tshe skye bo bdag gi ming thos pa dang / gzugs mthong bas dbang po mngon par g-yo ba'i tshe /
translated: Whenever people hear my name and see my form, their senses will be aroused.

original: de dag gi snying la hr'i: dmar po bsams nas /
analyzed: de dag gi snying la hr'i: dmar po bsams nas /
translated: In their hearts, imagine a red hriá¸¥.

original: sna bug g-yas nas spros pa'i sa bon las 'od kyi mda' bkye ba bsnun te /
analyzed: sna bug g-yas nas spros pa'i sa bon las 'od kyi mda' bkye ba bsnun te /
translated: From the seed syllable emitted from the right nostril, a light arrow is shot and strikes them.

original: de las bdud rtsi rgyun zags pas lus thams cad la khyab par bya'o //
analyzed: de las bdud rtsi rgyun zags pas lus thams cad la khyab par bya'o //
translated: The stream of nectar that falls from that should pervade their entire bodies.

original: byams pa'i lta bas rnam blta zhing //
analyzed: byams pa'i lta bas rnam blta zhing //
translated: Looking with the view of love,

original: rtag tu kun la snying rje 'jug / chags bral sdang ba yang med pa //
analyzed: rtag tu kun la snying rje 'jug / chags bral sdang ba yang med pa //
translated: Always engaging in compassion for all, free from attachment and aversion,ðŸ”½the adept captivates the minds of all beings, with well-tamed senses,

original: sgrub po 'gro ba kun yid 'phrog / dbang po rab tu dul ba dang // dregs med bka' blo rab tu bde //
analyzed: sgrub po 'gro ba kun yid 'phrog / dbang po rab tu dul ba dang // dregs med bka' blo rab tu bde //
translated: without arrogance, with a very happy mind,

original: 'jig rten mgon la lhag par dad //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon la lhag par dad //
translated: with faith in the Lord of the World.

original: yid gzhungs gang yin skal ldan mtshan //
analyzed: yid gzhungs gang yin skal ldan mtshan //
translated: The one with a sharp mind is endowed with good fortune.

original: ci ste 'di brtsams kyis ma spobs //
analyzed: ci ste 'di brtsams kyis ma spobs //
translated: If one is not confident in composing this,

original: de nas sbrang rtsi rma bya'i mdongs //
analyzed: de nas sbrang rtsi rma bya'i mdongs //
translated: then one should apply to the forehead a paste of honey, peacock bile,

original: me tog bzang po kun 'dab che //
analyzed: me tog bzang po kun 'dab che //
translated: good flowers, and water from a womb,

original: sbos chus sbyar ba smin mtshams byug / byang chub sems dkar dmar thig le //
analyzed: sbos chus sbyar ba smin mtshams byug / byang chub sems dkar dmar thig le //
translated: the white and red drops of bodhicitta,

original: rgya mtsho'i wu ba seng ldeng spags //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i wu ba seng ldeng spags //
translated: sea foam, acacia wood,

original: tsandan dmar po ga pur bcas //
analyzed: tsandan dmar po ga pur bcas //
translated: red sandalwood, and garlic.

original: dpral bar byugs la gsang sngags brjod //
analyzed: dpral bar byugs la gsang sngags brjod //
translated: Recite the secret mantra.

original: spyan ras gzigs dpal yid 'ong mthus //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dpal yid 'ong mthus //
translated: By the power of the beautiful AvalokiteÅ›vara,

original: dam bcas dam tshig rjes dran phyir //
analyzed: dam bcas dam tshig rjes dran phyir //
translated: remembering the pledge and vow,

original: rtag pa'i rgyal po las byed 'dis //
analyzed: rtag pa'i rgyal po las byed 'dis //
translated: this work of the king of permanence

original: skye bo kun yid mngon sum 'phrog / sems can mgu bar byed pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: skye bo kun yid mngon sum 'phrog / sems can mgu bar byed pa rdzogs so//
translated: The Satisfying of Sentient Beings is finished.
